text: Desmiphora mirim is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 2002. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Desmiphora mirim. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphora Category:Beetles described in 2002
title: Desmiphora mirim
